mapper.select: SELECT NVL(DAY(cashbook_date),0) cashbookDay ,NVL(SUM(cashbook_price),0) cashbookPrice FROM cashbook WHERE MONTH(cashbook_date) = #{month} AND YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} AND cashbook_kind = '수입' GROUP BY DAY(cashbook_date) ORDER BY SUM(cashbook_price)
